page.title: 02Lifestyles in Kingswood area
page.content: This is a very quiet area with well-to-do folk living in it, many of them{retired.}They pay high rates and live in expensive houses. They have mainly quiet{hobbies}and pass-times such as horse riding, golf and gardening. Kingswood is the most {expensive}part of the area with very big houses, costing as much as a quarter of a million pounds. While Lower Kingswood has slightly more modest housing (but still quite expensive by national standards). The people in the Kingswood area definitely have an easy life compared with many people in Britain today. As most of the land in the area is used for{farming,}most people{commute}to London for their work. { Car ownership}in the area is above average. Almost every household owns a car and many own more than one.
